tickets.title: Facebook account hacked and email changed
tickets.description: Someone accessed my Facebook account yesterday evening. They changed the recovery email and phone number. I can't login anymore. They're posting inappropriate content from my account.

tickets.title: Lost ₹25,000 in fake job scam
tickets.description: Paid registration fee for WFH data entry job that promised ₹35,000/month. After payment, they stopped responding. Have UPI transaction ID and WhatsApp chat screenshots.

tickets.title: Instagram bullying from fake account
tickets.description: Someone created fake Instagram account with my name and photos. They're sending abusive messages to my friends and posting embarrassing comments. This has been going on for 2 weeks.
tickets.resolution: Fake account reported and removed. Perpetrator identified and warned through legal channels.

tickets.title: Bank OTP scam - ₹50,000 transferred
tickets.description: Received call from 'bank executive' saying there's suspicious activity. They asked for OTP to 'secure account'. ₹50,000 transferred from my savings account immediately after sharing OTP.

tickets.title: WhatsApp account stolen via SIM swap
tickets.description: My WhatsApp stopped working yesterday. Today friends told me they received money requests from 'me' saying I'm in hospital emergency. Need ₹50,000 immediately.

tickets.title: Fake loan app threatening with personal photos
tickets.description: Downloaded loan app from Play Store. They accessed my gallery and contacts. Now threatening to share private photos with contacts if I don't pay 200% interest.

tickets.title: Online dating scam - Emotional fraud
tickets.description: Met someone on dating app. We talked for 3 months daily. Now they're asking for ₹2,00,000 for 'medical emergency' of their mother. Feeling emotionally manipulated.
tickets.resolution: Identified as professional romance scammer. Provided emotional support and counseling. Blocked and reported the profile.

tickets.title: Amazon delivery scam - Paid but product not delivered
tickets.description: Ordered iPhone from Amazon. Delivery person called saying COD not available, need to pay via UPI first. Paid ₹65,000 but no product delivered. Seller not responding.

tickets.title: Cryptocurrency investment scam
tickets.description: Invested ₹1,50,000 in crypto platform promising 5% daily returns. First week got returns, invested more. Now platform disappeared, can't withdraw anything.

tickets.title: Child's gaming account hacked - Money spent
tickets.description: My 12-year old son's gaming account was hacked. Hacker spent ₹8,500 on in-game purchases using saved card. Also changed password so he can't access account.
tickets.resolution: Account recovered, unauthorized purchases refunded by gaming company. Set up parental controls and spending limits.
